lines.text: Not because you love me or anything like that?
Would you ever get married again?
Can you stop watching TV for a minute?
Because. I had a bad day at work. I had to subvert my principles and kow-tow to an idiot. Television makes these daily sacrifices possible. Deadens the inner core of my being.
How long do you think it'll take?
I don't know. Not long, i guess.
I feel like smashing things up.
Relax. There's nothing to worry about. Why don't you go for a walk.
I don't wanna take a walk. You sure you wanna go through with this?
Marry me! Have the baby, we'll be a family.
How long do you think it'll take?
I don't know. Not long, i guess.
I feel like tearing somebody's head off.
Your job is making you boring and mean.
My job is making me a respectable member of society.
I had a bad day, I had to subvert my principles and kowtow to an idiot. Television makes these daily sacrifices possible. Deadens the inner core of my being.
They have television everywhere, there's no escape.
So... do you have a girlfriend?
What's that got to do with anything?
Oh, and what do you think that is?
I think you don't get laid enough.
What kind of a relationship could a guy as screwed up as you possibly have?
So you just love 'em and leave 'em?
So what, you just *have* a girl?
I take what I can get. Now if you're thru talkin', you wanna go out back and fuck?
A family's like a gun. You point it in the wrong direction and you're going to kill somebody.
I am ashamed. I am ashamed of being young I am ashamed of being stupid.

I'm looking at this guy, right? And I looked at him a lot before. So now I know that I have this little piece of him actually in me. Physically in me, and it makes me feel completely different, I don't know, sort of special or something. So I'm talking to him... I'm talking to him and I realize, I'm, I'm talking to him, and I realize that he doesn't even see me. And I'm wondering what it was he was seeing when he did this. I go over it in my head, and now I know what it was he was seeing. It's really simple. He's seeing my legs. He 's seeing my breasts. My ass. My mouth. He's seeing my cunt... How can I have been so stupid? That's really all there is to see, isn't it?
Why do you put up with me like this?
I just happened to be here.
